lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court ruled in favor of high school cheerleaders who had argued that their free speech was trampled by their school district when it ordered them not to display banners with Bible verses.

headline.print_headline: Texas: Court Sides With Cheerleaders on Bible Verses
headline.main: Texas: Court Sides With Cheerleaders on Bible Verses

snippet: The State Supreme Court ruled in favor of high school cheerleaders who had argued that their free speech was trampled by their school district when it ordered them not to display banners with Bible verses.
abstract: Texas State Supreme Court rules in favor of high school cheerleaders who claim their right to free speech was impinged upon by Kountze school district when it ordered them not to display banners inscribed with Bible verses at football games.
